nodes.text: LEGO Star Wars: Anakin: Space Pilot

LEGO Star Wars: Anakin: Space Pilot is a children's book published by Scholastic on January 1, 2011 that retells all of Anakin Skywalker's piloting achievements from the time he won the Boonta Eve Classic as a child, to when he was Darth Vader behind the controls of a TIE Fighter.
